bibl.title: The Grammatical Term épolelum°non in the School Book Brit. Mus. Add. MS. 37533 (= Pack2 2712). <apolelumenon>
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. Add. Ms. 37533 (= Pack2 2712) of the IIIrd century A.D. provides a new attestation for the term épolelum°non to indicate the positive degree of an adjective. <apolelumenon>
bibl.seg: WOUTERS Alfons, The Grammatical Term épolelum°non in the School Book Brit. Mus. Add. MS. 37533 (= Pack2 2712). <apolelumenon>
